Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryId
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IPAM Resource Discovery Association.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IPAM Resource Discovery Association.

properties.name: IpamId
properties.description: The Id of the IPAM this Resource Discovery is associated to.

type.description: The Id of the IPAM this Resource Discovery is associated to.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: IpamRegion
properties.description: The home region of the IPAM.

type.description: The home region of the IPAM.

properties.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryAssociationId
properties.description: Id of the IPAM Resource Discovery Association.

type.description: Id of the IPAM Resource Discovery Association.

properties.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryAssociationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource discovery association is a part of.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource discovery association is a part of.

properties.name: IsDefault
properties.description: If the Resource Discovery Association exists due as part of CreateIpam.

type.description: If the Resource Discovery Association exists due as part of CreateIpam.

properties.name: OwnerId
properties.description: The AWS Account ID for the account where the shared IPAM exists.

type.description: The AWS Account ID for the account where the shared IPAM exists.

properties.name: State
properties.description: The operational state of the Resource Discovery Association. Related to Create/Delete activities.

type.description: The operational state of the Resource Discovery Association. Related to Create/Delete activities.

properties.name: ResourceDiscoveryStatus
properties.description: The status of the resource discovery.

type.description: The status of the resource discovery.
